name: Tenori-on
overview: Toshio Iwai, creator of the DS title Electroplankton, also developed the digital musical instrument Tenori-on with Yamaha in 2007. Before that, he made and sold a WonderSwan version at a Bandai expo in Japan back in 2000. It's believed only around 120 were sold there, and the cartridge was never released commercially afterward.
